game.name: Sweet Cafe
game.shortDescription: Sweet Cafe - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a cafe, featuring the daily lives of five beautiful waitresses, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sweet Cafe - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a cafe, featuring the daily lives of five beautiful waitresses, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.
